content: ever been called a liberal snowflake then this pattern is for you remember that a million snowflakes make an avalanche the pattern calls for sport weight yarn in the following quantities 115 m/125 yards in main colour 55 m/60 yards in contrast colour the sample hat was knitted in rauma finullgarn 175m/50g finull is a woollen-spun rustic norwegian yarn that knits up much more robustly and thickly than a worsted-spun merino yarn of the same yardage and weight
